scripts.dev: ls *.js | GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=../../secrets/sa-workflows-runner.json NODE_ENV=production TELEGRAM=$(cat ../../secrets/telegram.json) WEBPAGETEST=$(cat ../../secrets/webpagetest.json) entr -r functions-framework --source index.js --target runQueryOnCrUX --port 8080
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules TELEGRAM=$(cat ../../secrets/telegram.json) WEBPAGETEST=$(cat ../../secrets/webpagetest.json) npx jest --config jest.config.cjs --rootDir ./ --forceExit
scripts.test:open-handles: NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules TELEGRAM=$(cat ../../secrets/telegram.json) WEBPAGETEST=$(cat ../../secrets/webpagetest.json) npx jest --config jest.config.cjs --rootDir ./ --runInBand --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:ci: NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules TELEGRAM=$(cat ../../secrets/telegram.json) WEBPAGETEST=$(cat ../../secrets/webpagetest.json) npx jest --config jest.config.cjs --rootDir ./ --ci --forceExit
